    • getAllHospitalStays

      @GetMapping public Collection<HospitalStayDto> getAllHospitalStays()
      Returns:
      Collection of HospitalStayDto models of all HospitalStays in the repository

    • getStayById

      @GetMapping("/{id:\\d+}") public HospitalStayDto getStayById(@PathVariable("id") Long id)
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the HospitalStay
      Returns:
      HospitalStayDto model of the HospitalStay with param id

    • getAllTestsForHospitalStay

      @GetMapping("/{stayId}/tests") public Collection<TestDto> getAllTestsForHospitalStay(@PathVariable("stayId") Long stayId)
      Parameters:
      stayId - ID of the HospitalStay, whose tests will be collected
      Returns:
      Collection of TestDto models of all tests with stayId corresponding to the param stayId

    • createNewHospitalStay

      @PostMapping public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<HospitalStayDto> createNewHospitalStay(@Valid @RequestBody @Valid InputHospitalStayDto inputHospitalStayDto, org.springframework.validation.Errors errors)
      Parameters:
      inputHospitalStayDto - model of the HospitalStay that has to be created
      errors - that may appear due to invalid input data
      Returns:
      HospitalStayDto model of the created HospitalStay

    • updateHospitalStay

      @PutMapping("/{id}") public HospitalStayDto updateHospitalStay(@PathVariable("id") Long id, @Valid @RequestBody @Valid UpdateHospitalStayDto updateStayDto, org.springframework.validation.Errors errors)
      Parameters:
      id - of the HospitalStay that will be updated
      updateStayDto - input DTO model of the HospitalStay with applied changes
      errors - that may appear due to invalid input data
      Returns:
      HospitalStayDto model of the updated HospitalStay

    • addDecursus

      @PutMapping("/{id}/decursus") public HospitalStayDto addDecursus(@PathVariable("id") Long id, @Valid @RequestBody @Valid String decursus, org.springframework.validation.Errors errors)
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the HospitalStay where decursus will be added
      decursus - The value of the "text" property of the Decursus that will be added to the Decursus collection in HospitalStay
      errors - that may appear due to invalid input data
      Returns:
      HospitalStayDto model of the updated with the added Decursus HospitalStay

    • editDecursus

      @PutMapping("/{id}/editdecursus/{decId}") public HospitalStayDto editDecursus(@PathVariable("id") Long id, @PathVariable("decId") Long decId, @Valid @RequestBody @Valid String decursus)
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the HospitalStay whose decursus collection will be edited
      decId - ID of the Decursus that will be modified
      decursus - the updated version of the Decursus with param decId
      Returns:
      HospitalStayDto model of the updated with the edited Decursus HospitalStay

    • deleteDecursus

      @PutMapping("{id}/deletedecursus/{decId}") public HospitalStayDto deleteDecursus(@PathVariable("id") Long id, @PathVariable("decId") Long decId)
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the HospitalStay in whose Decursus Collection an element will be deleted
      decId - ID of the Decursus that will be deleted
      Returns:
      HospitalStayDto model of the updated with the deleted Decursus HospitalStay

    • addTreatment

      @PutMapping("/{id}/treatment") public HospitalStayDto addTreatment(@PathVariable("id") Long id, @Valid @RequestBody @Valid List<String> medications, org.springframework.validation.Errors errors)
      Parameters:
      id - ID of the HospitalStay whose treatment collection will be modified
      medications - - List of Strings with the elements that will be added to the treatment collection
      errors - that may appear due to invalid input data
      Returns:
      HospitalStayDto model of the updated with added treatment HospitalStay

    • dischargePatient

      @PutMapping("/{stayId}/discharge") public HospitalStayDto dischargePatient(@PathVariable("stayId") Long stayId, @Valid @RequestBody @Valid DischargeHospitalStayDto dischargeHospitalStayDto, org.springframework.validation.Errors errors)
      Parameters:
      stayId - ID of the HospitalStay, whose "isActive" property will be set to "false" value
      dischargeHospitalStayDto - input DTO model with changes that will be applied to the HospitalStay
      errors - that may appear due to invalid input data
      Returns:
      HospitalStayDto model of the updated HospitalStay

    • getDischargeSummary

      @GetMapping(value="/{stayId}/dischargesummary", produces="text/plain") public String getDischargeSummary(@PathVariable("stayId") Long stayId)
      Parameters:
      stayId - ID of the HospitalStay, whose discharge summary will be provided
      Returns:
      String value of the discharge summary

    • deleteStayById

      @DeleteMapping("/{id}") public HospitalStayDto deleteStayById(@PathVariable("id") Long id)
      Parameters:
      id - of the HospitalStay that will be deleted
      Returns:
      HospitalStayDto model of the HospitalStay that was deleted

    • getCountOfHospitalStays

      @GetMapping(value="/count", produces="text/plain") public String getCountOfHospitalStays()
      Returns:
      count of all HospitalStays in the repository
